website_summaries.verdict: Another year of incremental improvements for the 15-inch Apple MacBook Pro help it maintain its lead as a useful, powerful, attractive midsize laptop, but the competition is closer than ever to catching up.
pros: A faster processor, improved graphics, and USB 3.0 highlight a series of internal improvements in the new 15-inch MacBook Pro
cons: The unchanged design is starting to feel a little dated
Any real structural changes, HDMI, higher-res displays, were reserved for the Retina display version of the MacBook Pro

customer_reviews.title: the computer was dented all around the apple sign on ...
customer_reviews.text: the computer was dented all around the apple sign on the back of the computer I was very unhappy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MOM

customer_reviews.title: "Refurbished?" Try, "Repackaged and resold"
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought, the screen's hinge wasn't tight and it wobbled and wouldn't stay upright. There were minor dents in the laptop casing but those didn't impact its actual use like an unstable screen that kept falling down. I returned it and ordered another in hopes of it being better. The second one looked like someone had played football with it or dropped it down a stairwell. I have no pictures, but the screen was partially shattered and there were huge dents in the exterior casing. The exterior also had large black scuff marks on it, but again, those didn't impact the actual use of the laptop, but a broken screen and dented disc drive did.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Renée

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Since I had bought this product I've had to take it back in twice because it completely shut down and they need to fix it such a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop (Renewed)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased same exact model elsewhere. Had so many issues: several cosmetic defects, power cord not working, computer not powering on, screen blanking out, etc. Not the case with this one purchased through Amazon. This one was in great condition inside and out. Powered on right away, stays on. Great purchase and a great price. Also, has an initial warranty, for no hassle return/exchange if there is an issue. Unbeatable deal!! Perfect for a student on budget.
customer_reviews.author: 4SweetTs

customer_reviews.title: this was a waste of time and a very disappointing experience
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived and upon start up made a lot of noise from the fan. After contacting apple support there was nothing that could be done about the issue and I had to return the MacBook. this was a waste of time and a very disappointing experience. I've always really trusted amazon to be reputable but now I have to be more skeptical when they say "certified refurbished"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a huge hassle.
customer_reviews.text: These incompetent fools couldn’t even log the damn computer out of the previous remote management. Now we’re stuck with a computer that you can’t even Log into. Seriously, how hard is it to ship an effective product?
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bennett 302

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: It was prefect. It came a day earlier than the original delivery date and when I unpacked the MacBook it was just like new. I have never bought a refurbished computer before and I am glad I did. It had the OS El Capitan system and I was able to upgrade to Sierra 10.13.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Looks very very used... embarrassed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...It wasn't opened until Christmas.. it was embarrassing how beat up & scratched the computer was.. it wasn't presentable.. will be returning..
customer_reviews.author: Caramel skin color

customer_reviews.title: I recommend never buying a used computer here again
customer_reviews.text: This computer should not have been sold on the open market. The mother board was junk, completely inoperative m. I paid to erase all information before sending it back. I recommend never buying a used computer here again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying this because there were a lot of mixed reviews but I am glad I did. It was in flawless condition except this used to be owned by a school and there was things engraved on the outside of the MacBook (but I Doubt that will happen and someone else) Besides that one thing I would highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: The MacBook didn't bring hard drive
customer_reviews.text: The MacBook physically is in perfect condition, but didnt bring the hard drive, I had to buy one for $ 30. What a disappointment! :@

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I am very much satisfied with my purchase. It is a good bank for the buck. Although it tends to slow down with multiple apps open, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The laptop never booted on even after a full charge. I also experienced difficulty in getting refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Sulli

customer_reviews.title: never had a problem - ran like a champion
customer_reviews.text: This is in fact the Latest / Last Macbook Pro that has the DVD Drive & Upgradable Memory & Hard Drive for normal users. Upon my purchase I immediately upgraded it to a 1TB hard Drive & 16 GB memory. Had it for a while now, never had a problem - ran like a champion!
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: This is a horribly outdated 6 year old laptop
customer_reviews.text: Why is this being sold. This is a horribly outdated 6 year old laptop. It shouldn't be sold for more than $400 refurbished or not.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Have one myself. It's 3 years old now and runs dual boot Windows 7 via boot camp. I upgraded the ram to 8 and handles Adobe CS 6 like a boss. Never crashed and I have no plans on changing anything else. My only complaint is that the internal speaker sucks, but that can be remedied with any bluetooth speaker or headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan D. Huber

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous with all the bad reviews but this laptop is in like-new almost new condition. It came way faster than i thought it would. all around great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a fantastic piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I am middle school teacher and have had my MacBook for two years and have not had one single issue or complaint. It is a fantastic piece of equipment. I have owned and used at least a half dozen other laptops over the last dozen years or so and the MacBook is head and shoulders above the competition. Sadly, I am moving out of state and will have to turn my MacBook back into my district. Unfortunately, I cannot afford to purchase a new MacBook, so I will miss this amazing piece of equipment. Yes it's expensive, but as the saying goes, "You get what you pay for." You will not be disappointed purchasing a MacBook!
customer_reviews.author: Fogerty Fanatic
